messages

Class HeartBeat

  • java.lang.Object
    • messages.HeartBeat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class HeartBeat
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Heartbeat is a class that implements Serializable. It represents an message that is passed from the leader to all followers and performs two functions: 1. Followers need to receive regular heartbeats from the leader to know that the leader is still alive 2. Heartbeats carry the logs which will be written into the distributed ledger
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • HeartBeat

        public HeartBeat(HostInfo hostInfo,
                 List<Log> updates,
                 Route destination,
                 RoutingTable rt,
                 Ledger ledger)
        The Constructor for the Heartbeat (AppendEntries RPC)
        Parameters:
        hostInfo - The HostInfo Object to obtain relevant info for this heartbeat
        updates - the List of Log entries to be sent in this Heartbeat (AppendEntries RPC)
        destination - The Route which is the (intended) follower this Heartbeat is being sent to
        rt - The RoutingTable by which to obtain the prevLogIndex and prevLog info
        ledger - The Ledger object to obtain info needed in this heartbeat

        public boolean hasReplied()
        Test to see if this is an AppendEntries RPC (leader to follower) or a response (follower to leader)

        returns a boolean to test whether this a initiating or response Heartbeat
